name: check-ip
description: Check-IP is a powerful IP address validation utility package for JavaScript and TypeScript, inspired by the robust functionalities of 'node-ip' and 'valid-ip.' This package excels in providing an easy-to-use, yet comprehensive, solution for validating IP addresses in various contexts.

scripts.ci: pnpm type-check && pnpm test && pnpm build
scripts.release: pnpm type-check && pnpm test && pnpm build && changeset publish
